EmailTemplate.description: Invitation from Enterprise Reps for Frost & Sullivan webinar
EmailTemplate.name: Frost & Sullivan_Identifying the Value of Video Collaboration
EmailTemplate.subject: Frost & Sullivan Webinar: Leveraging the Value of Video Collaboration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi. Wanted to touch base to let you know about an upcoming webinar: "Leveraging the Value of Video Collaboration."
Frost & Sullivan Principal Analyst, Melanie Turek, will discuss how video conferencing and collaboration applications are changing the way enterprises do business. The results? Increased productivity, lower costs and a stronger bottom line.
Key takeaways will be: Technology for the virtual workplace What to look for in a video collaboration solution Best practices and recommendations
It's Thursday, March 15, 2012 from 1:00-2:00 p.m. ET. You can register at http://bit.ly/wMtyY6.
We hope you'll be able to join us.
